titleStmt.title: The arte of diuine meditation profitable for all Christians to knowe and practise; exemplified with a large meditation of eternall life. By Ioseph Hall.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Humfrey Lownes for Samuel Macham, and Mathew Cooke: and are to bee sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Tigers head,

notesStmt.note: A2, title page (a cancel) is mounted; A1 and I12 probably blank, lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
